summary: These files replace the "Fus Ro Dah" words in the Unrelenting Force shout with the Expelliarmus from Harry Potter's stories.
descriptionHtml:
Hello! This is my first mod, although it's very simple and didn't require messing with the CK.

I did this basically because I wanted to learn how to edit voices and shouts in Skyrim.

This mod replaces the [i]femaleeventoned[/i] and [i]maleeventoned[/i] versions of the shout (male version sounds better).

I hope you enjoy it!


[color=#ff0000]NOTE:[/color]
If you prefer, you can use the [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/61497/?]Disarm shout replacer[/url] instead of this one.
author: DigitalWolf

files.name: Expelliarmus Shout - Unrelenting Force Replacer - Male Eventoned Version
files.fileName: Expelliarmus Shout - Unrelenting Force Replacer - Male Eventoned Version-61445-.rar
